Premium Managed Linux is expert support for your CoreOS machines in your private datacenter or in the cloud. Also included is CoreUpdate, a security software that keeps your CoreOS machines up-to-date and secure by automatically installing the needed patches and upgrades
Many security-minded teams use Premium Managed Linux in concert with the rest of the CoreOS stack and Kubernetes to build a scalable, secure environment.
